website_summaries.verdict: A dual-action airbrush upgrade  that has a comfortable trigger system.
pros: Suitable for a variety of uses
Delivers consistent air pressure for even results
Comes with compact air compressor, 3 airbrush guns, and a braided 6-foot air hose
cons: Follow setup guide carefully to avoid leakage

customer_reviews.title: glad i purchased the warrenty, because it broke right away...
customer_reviews.text: Got to use the compressor for no more than 20 seconds before the black gun broke. Air hose was leaking air, as the compressor kicks in and holds pressure to 60psi, before it continues to drop without anything being released on the triggers. Unable to spray out anything otherwise from this gun, (with or without ink) Tried switching to the other two fine detail guns that were provided but nothing is able to connect to the hose. I feel like I'm missing connectors for these two to be used. Hoping others have a better experience with this product, I'm rather not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I Do Not Recommend This Compressor Or The Guns That Come With It
customer_reviews.text: So ! I've Had This For Almost 6 Months Now. I've Barely Used It, And Its Already Breaking Down. I Do Not Recommend This Compressor Or The Guns That Come With It. The Guns Get Clogged Extremely Fast No Matter How Thin The Paint Is, And After A While (A Few Months Of Use) The Pressure Starts To Go Off And On In The Middle Of Whatever You're Doing So Projects Take Longer To Do.
customer_reviews.author: K Abram

customer_reviews.title: Great deal deffinetly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set as an intro into airbrushing and I can not believe how nice it really is, compressor works great and the same for the air brushes they may not be big name brand or name brand at all but they work great no issues! Eventually I'll want to step up to a name brand airbrush but so far this set has done everything I've asked of it flawlessly If you're just getting into airbrushing or just needing a compressor I can't recommend this enough!
customer_reviews.author: David carroll

customer_reviews.title: STAY AWAY FROM THIS
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for an airbrush system for a one time use then this is the system for you because one use is all you are going to get out of it. After using each gun one time (and I do mean one time) they will not work again. It doesn't matter how much you clean them or anything. By far the worst purchase I have ever made in my life. Total waste of money. The only reason I gave it a one star is because it wouldn't let me give it zero stars.
customer_reviews.author: Ozzy81

customer_reviews.title: Very Good starter set and excellent value
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my adult son who is new to airbrushing. It's a very complete kit with 3 different brushes, hoses, compressor, etc. I also purchased a separate cleaning kit. He's been very happy with it so far. Everything works well, the compressor is quiet, and he's learning to produce very good results on the models he is painting. I opted for a kit because some of the brushes, hoses, and compressors use different fittings -- this kit makes everything easier for a rookie. His only complaint is the brushes require frequent cleaning and are somewhat difficult to clean. He may purchase a different type of brush in hopes it will be easier to maintain and use.
customer_reviews.author: GeekDaddy

customer_reviews.title: Not for chocolate or cocoa butter
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to use with chocolate and cocoa butter. I can only get one airbrush to work with cocoa butter and not well at that.
customer_reviews.author: Kim M.

customer_reviews.title: Make sure there are no air leaks
customer_reviews.text: From the day I hooked it up it had air leaks everywhere. I tried to plug them all by resealing the threads. The compressor did not cycle properly, so the motor got hot and started making a lot of noise. To late to send it back now. Bought a new one for 1/3 the price no guns, but runs fine.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: I guess its good?
customer_reviews.text: Ive never used an airbrush before...ever, so I have nothing to compare it to. I will say that I found it very easy to pick up and learn. After years of drawing and painting with both analog and digital mediums, airbrushing felt very natural to me. The compressor is quiet and seems to be of good quality. Ive only used 1 one the 3 air brushes so far, and cleaning it after use and between colors isnt very hard. My only complaint is that on the one brush ive used, the fire button can actually be pulled out and is not the easiest thing to put back in.
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: Customer service was very helpful
customer_reviews.text: When I first hooked everything up after receiving the package the compressor stopped working after only 2-3 minutes. I contacted the seller, who immediately offered to send out a replacement. I received the replacement promptly, and everything is working without an issue now. (Well, now the issue is me and I have no talent!) But I got it in time to paint the project I wanted this for, and I'm happy with the purchase, and even happier with the customer service.
customer_reviews.author: A customer

customer_reviews.title: Good starter airbrush kit
customer_reviews.text: Has most things you need to begin using airbrushes. Easy to handle, relatively compact, and works like a charm with little problems. You can use it to paint scale models. You do have to clean it a lot more often than if you were going to use brushes, but that's really with every airbrush. I recommend getting Iwata-Medea airbrush cleaner with it. However I have only used the 0.3mm one (I think it's the gravity-fed one with the larger cup). I have tried to use the siphon one, but I can't seem to figure out how to attach it into the compressor yet.
customer_reviews.author: Bao Chau T. Duong

customer_reviews.title: Airbrush may be cheap but all in all ok
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good so far. Compressor works pretty well but about three days after I ordered it, the black airbrush with the jar developed an air leak. I thought it was the hose until I attached another airbrush. I didn’t want to send the whole thing back, I guess I can try to contact the seller for a replacement? We’ll see how that goes.
customer_reviews.author: JustJon

customer_reviews.title: A very nice little compressor unit with constant pressure
customer_reviews.text: A very nice little compressor unit with constant pressure. Using it at 20 psi with good results so far. I'm pleased with my first results, but understand that I'm a newbie and have no prior experience with using an air brush. I'm learning via You Tube instruction, with pretty good results. I'm thinking that with time and perhaps a more sophisticated compressor, I'll get even better at air brushing techniques. This PointZero unit is an excellent beginning. I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: D Awtrey

customer_reviews.title: Thanks to this new airbrush, I have a fun new hobby.
customer_reviews.text: I did a bunch of fun projects with this and I am very happy with it. I never had an airbrush before and I had no experience with it.
customer_reviews.author: F. Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Super Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: PointZero Airbrush Dual Action Airbrush Kit with 3 Guns is a easy product to use. This product is well built and made of great material. The compressor is a medium size compressor but delivers very good and as good as the larger on. The three guns are good for price and package deal comes with a CD and it explains on how to use this product. It also comes with an hose. This company will work with you if have any problems.....I give this company and amazon an A++++++
customer_reviews.author: mike smith

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: It is OK, but it gets clogged often and the paint will not flow. I have to dilute the paint a lot to make it work. Not as good as I expected. The compressor is fine. It is the paint brushes I am not liking since they constantly get clogged, and it is pain in a neck to get anything painted. But I supposed all these airbrushes will have similar problem. This is my first airbrush so I can not compare it to other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Maciek Kormicki

customer_reviews.title: Shopped around, best reviewed, best price.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. I really shopped around, this was by far the best price, and best reviewed airbrush kit available. Arrived on time, well packaged, in perfect condition. Purchased for painting models, but my wife is interested in using it for makeup, and I'll give it a try for cake decorating,(with dedicated airbrushes of course!) Very happy with this kit.
customer_reviews.author: JimofSalem

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for any artist, beginner or advanced.
customer_reviews.text: I'll use it for painting on my original clothing designs and for sign jobs or painting on vehicles when I get commissioned. I'll also use it for effects on my canvas paintings......and the list goes on. Great artist tools.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Schlabach

customer_reviews.title: This Product is going back... byeeeeee
customer_reviews.text: No directions, DVD (who uses DVDs anymore?) didn't work, airbrushes constantly clogged from the start
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great. Several options for spraying, good compressor. Seem to hold great so far. I tried several other styles, and brands, but hands down my favorite so far
customer_reviews.author: Irfireman

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner setup
customer_reviews.text: Great for beginners, a but if a pain to clean at times. Have had no issues with acrylic paint for Gunpla models. As I get more advanced I can see myself getting a better airbrush though but this one is getting the job done. No issues at all with how it works. Easy to set pressure. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginners.
customer_reviews.text: so I've never airbrush and this set up is great for a beginner like me. But gun will fail after a good month or 2 of using it. O rings are already failed and air starts to escape from it. That's why it only gets 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian M.

customer_reviews.title: I had mostly success with this product. Giving it ...
customer_reviews.text: I had mostly success with this product. Giving it three stars because the siphon brush button quit working less than one month into use, and the brush became unusable. Air compressor and both gravity brushes work well so far. Attaching some of the work I've done.
customer_reviews.author: mje006

customer_reviews.title: An excellent kit for modelers.
customer_reviews.text: As a modeling hobbyist this package performed perfectly for my model building projects. The compressor maintains steady pressures and the airbrushes provided are a perfect starting kit.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Airbrushes are junk.
customer_reviews.text: The compressor seems to be pretty solid. Works good, produces air continuously. The brushes, however, are another story. One of the gravity feed brushes broke the very first day. The other doesn't work any longer, though it doesn't seem physically broken and I've attempted to clean any clogs in it. I haven't used the siphon feed system because I just don't need it for my purposes to paint miniatures. Do yourself a favor, get a better airbrush, but you might be okay with the compressor bought separately.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Corey

customer_reviews.title: It broke on me before a month in thank god but the pens are fine just the compressor broke
customer_reviews.text: the compressor broke within less than a month with very little use. will be asking for a return or a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Chang

customer_reviews.title: Would be helpful to have a product manual
customer_reviews.text: This kit comes with everything you need to get started. However, as a beginner, I would have liked a product manual. The DVD that comes with it provides general information, but it would have been nice to get more detailed information on how to dissemble each airbrush to clean, the size needle and how to change them, and a troubleshooting guide.
customer_reviews.author: Silvia Benincaso

customer_reviews.title: good for starter not really beginners
customer_reviews.text: there are no written instructions but all online and they are not great. Utube helps with this. I'm told the spattering is due to my mixing or thinning, and the adjustments are pretty normal. Good starter to learn on If prefect is not required
customer_reviews.author: James S.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Deal!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome price for everything included! Airbrushes work fantastically and absolutely no issues whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Smith

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use my 8 year olds understand how to operate it.
customer_reviews.text: My daughters and i were so excited to buy an airbrush for cake decorating. Tonite we tried it out and we had so much fun. The system is easy to set up, and the video about basics is helpful. Clean up was easy and i can see us looking for excuses to make things just to practice with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Set with Great Customer Service.
customer_reviews.text: Really high quality product. I did have a problem with one the airbrushes, the smallest 0.2mm detail brush. PointZero’s customer service was excellent. Very responsive. Resolved my issue in a quick and professional manner. Honestly, these brushes work as well as ones 5 times the price in my opinion. Great starter set.
customer_reviews.author: David Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: Actually I should have rented or borrowed a unit like this. I purchased for one job in my travel trailer to cover a small area of paint on the bathroom wall that got scratch off. The unit preformed well and the small guns put paint just where I wanted it. I am very happy with the operation of the unit and the accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Anger

customer_reviews.title: Air compressor stop working to soon
customer_reviews.text: The air compressor stopped working after the 3 times of use, I only used it 5 minutes (they recommended 10 minutes to use then stop) I did that and the it stop working, I see lots giving 5 stars I wish I could do the same but for me was the worth thing I ever get.
customer_reviews.author: Hilda

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the beginning hobbyist!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, a great deal. We've been using it several times a week, and it's working great!
customer_reviews.author: Ilc

customer_reviews.title: Good starter kit
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a good starter kit to get your feet wet but dont expect top notch quality. Used the syphon feed several times and works good. The quick disconnect that came with one of the guns is worthless. The flow control on the compressor doesn't seem to work. But it worked for my first couple of projects so far
customer_reviews.author: DarkLight2sure

customer_reviews.title: No Duracoat
customer_reviews.text: If you are going to spray Duracoat with these guns, don't. Compressor works well. Guns are very easily stopped up.
customer_reviews.author: party on

customer_reviews.title: very easy to start with
customer_reviews.text: I am a beginner, so I don't know how this compares to higher end gear, but this was a great startup kit. It is easy to use and seems like a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Moore

customer_reviews.title: Another Blank Disk!  "How to" fail!
customer_reviews.text: Works fine! I like it. I got the Point Zero cleaning kit at the same time. Both were supposed to have a "How to" disk. now I got two blank disks! Someone should really look at a disk once in a while while they're burning them.
customer_reviews.author: YoJo

customer_reviews.title: Take care of it and it'll last
customer_reviews.text: Everything was there in the package as advertised .. Works fine feels good ..... As a first timer to airbrushing cleaning the gun looked a bit intimidating but..... Easier than it looks. Use the right paint for the project and youre ok......(i only trust createx tho)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works with Cerakote!
customer_reviews.text: Gotta give this 5 stars because as soon as it arrived, it was set up and used for a Cerakote H color then a gloss clear coat MC-156 after the color coat was heat cured. While the instruction DVD is a little light on technical info (a booklet would be better). I honestly wasn't sure if this would work with Cerakote but it did....just be sure to always strain the Cerakote after mixing the binary components.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Hubby absolutely loves this! He is learning and coming up with some pretty good pictures!
customer_reviews.author: Sassie

customer_reviews.title: Excelent product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Son. It arrived very quickly. Everything was very well packed. Although I've not used it, ti appears of very good quality. The pump is exceptionally quiet :)
customer_reviews.author: Rob Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Okay I have to admit that I haven't used it yet, and also I am a complete beginner. I just felt compelled to write a review because it just seems like so much value for the money! All 3! guns come in a nice little case. You can tell that everything is not top of the line materials and builds, but still a great package for 100 bucks!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Cann

customer_reviews.title: Great for cerakote
customer_reviews.text: Keep it clean and works great. Pump will run continuously for painting surfaces such as gun uppers and lowers and hand guards. Sprays cerakote very well.
customer_reviews.author: adam o.

customer_reviews.title: Great brushes. Poor dvd. Works wonderfuly.
customer_reviews.text: The brushes worked wonderfully all but the single action but that's just how I've learned the brushes work. Every single action brush I've purchased has broken. The machine works great and they delivered it very quickly I love the airbrush set and use it very quickly. Use youtube to learn if you are a beginer the directional dvd is garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Jorrien Mesa

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for The Cost
customer_reviews.text: I am definitely a beginner. First of all, great price for all the equipment you get (compressor and 3 air brushes). Novice shoe restorer and this easy to use machine has made my projects come out great. Take care of it and it’ll take care of you.
customer_reviews.author: Oz

customer_reviews.title: GARBAGE
customer_reviews.text: Absolute garbage product. No matter how many times I clean the gun and lower the pressure it won't spray out of the sprayer. It all shoots out of the top. Take your money elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: pballer

customer_reviews.title: This is a wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality, very nice set up. Almost everything you need to do the best job possible. In fact the other things I bought after the video (on the disc) You don't have to have to start using it, they just make it even nicer.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Good for just getting into airbrushing.
customer_reviews.text: Works well for painting RC car bodies. Don't expect too much from it for a large job, the compressor will keep running and overheat. The airbrushes work ok. They are not smooth like a badger, etc. but they work fine. Surprisingly fine detail is possible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent way to start airbrush
customer_reviews.text: I love this kit. I am just getting started into air brushing. I have been able to do lots of awesome projects. I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Swofford

customer_reviews.title: Airbrush Rush
customer_reviews.text: The compressor seems good... the airbrush with the paint jars seems a little cheap.... the one with the gravity well seems ok....
customer_reviews.author: JungleJim

customer_reviews.title: Spend the $ and buy the best.
customer_reviews.text: Not that this item is bad but it can get very frustrating so I would recommend that you buy the best right off the bat.
customer_reviews.author: fred hug

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: As a beginner I thought the airbrush worked very well I was excited when It came I did try it out it works great I use it to airbrush my cakes but I still need to get the hang of it. There is a lot I need to learn, but again it’s a great product. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Nice 14

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: The air brush and guns work great for the price you pay this is a nice set if you are new to air brushing and don't know if you will really get into it or use it a lot
customer_reviews.author: Justin Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly great!
customer_reviews.text: I'm used to higher end equipment. The performance is very comparable. The quality is great and it's worth every bit of the price!
customer_reviews.author: M. Nott

customer_reviews.title: Airbrush
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It was a great investment. Something ive put off and wish I would’ve gotten it a lot sooner. I cant wait to actually put it to work for now its really fun to play around with. I recommend doing research on how to utilize it if you have to prior experience. Some of my crafts ive created so far are on my ig: @mix_creationss
customer_reviews.author: Lo. x MixCreations

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this airbrush set/ kit seems everything I could need and more to do the jobs and project I have lined up. The quality is great on these no complaints. Pretty easy to set up. I also bought the cleaning kit from the same vendor on amazon and they packaged everything together nice neat and delivered it 2days before the expected date.
customer_reviews.author: GCZ

customer_reviews.title: This is a great little cIt was quieter than what I thought it would be goodbyeompressor
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little compressor It was quieter than what I thought it would be good buy
customer_reviews.author: Purple Martin

customer_reviews.title: Very good system
customer_reviews.text: Quietest compressor ever had. Works great. 3 air brushes are better quality than I expected. Well built and work great.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Freerking

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research before making this purchase. I am new to airbrushing. The three airbrushes are good quality and are easy to use. The compressor is more than adequate. I would recommend this to anyone wanting to learn how to airbrush. I believe this kit would also satisfy an accomplished airbrusher.
customer_reviews.author: Garry Good

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: First time buying and using an airbrush. This is very nice for the price. Easy to clean. Havent used all the guns yet but its nice one is dual movement.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Nice Kit to Start Me Out.
customer_reviews.text: The only thing wrong is so minor it doesn't matter. The decal on the compressor was crooked but who cares? Everything else is fine and I am happy with the kit!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: GOOD SET! Glad I got it.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty damn nice airbrush and compressor set. I've used it three times now with the big gravity fed cup airbrush and its awesome. As long as it stays like this, I'll be a happy camper.
customer_reviews.author: jrice73

customer_reviews.title: works great without a big mess
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to touch up trim and small areas in my new house, works great without a big mess, some thicker paints might need to be thinned a little but over all a great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Randall Crane

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Got this kit recently, as I am new at airbrushing. The compressor that came with the kit didn’t work, but we contacted the seller and they immediately shipped a new one, worked like a charm! The airbrushes are good as far as I can tell and the instructional DVD was helpful as well.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Saxton

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Great for beginners! DH and son are using in die cast car models.
customer_reviews.author: Fox

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and well made. Got it in 1 day
customer_reviews.author: Holly A Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Poor performance
customer_reviews.text: No assembly instructions, one gun had no adapter to connect to compressor. Paint barely came out of the other two guns and when it did it was not smooth. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy C. Colbert

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea
customer_reviews.text: This is a requested gift I am giving. I don't know anything about the product to review for you
customer_reviews.author: sherri a.

customer_reviews.title: Cars
customer_reviews.text: Daughter airbrushes vehicles using this machine. She says it works great and is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Hey

customer_reviews.title: Good air brush kit.
customer_reviews.text: My neighbor who is a super pro airbrush painter was absolutely floored over the quality and content of this kit. I am looking forward to learning how to be as good as she is.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great buy....i still suck at airbrushing but i'm getting better!
customer_reviews.author: david fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Great airbrush! My daughter is an artist and She ...
customer_reviews.text: Great airbrush! My daughter is an artist and She wanted to try something new and figured it right away! She loves it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was my purchase worth it ,read to find out more
customer_reviews.text: it came on time, it was complete, works good so far, I have no complaints. If I was to need another one I would definitely buy from this seller again
customer_reviews.author: Jason Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Compressor great, guns not so much.
customer_reviews.text: I’m pleased with the air compressor it’s self, the guns not so much. 3rd time I used the air brush gun and it no longer works, the lever when pushed down will not release the plunger on the inside of the gun to let any air out. It’s beyond frustrating, not all the guns are of the same quality.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and it’s a great starter kit!
customer_reviews.author: Lai

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: She loves it. Does the job as expected. A great buy for beginners,
customer_reviews.author: Constance

customer_reviews.title: Everyone starts somewhere!
customer_reviews.text: It's very easy to set up and use. Expect about shoebox size so it shouldn't take up much space. This unit came with three different air brush ends which is awesome! The brochure was more trouble than worth, dead link.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Best in the game
customer_reviews.text: Auto on and off is amazing everything came as advertised it came faster than expected. If your having doubts then don't cause this is what your looking for.
customer_reviews.author: I bought it

customer_reviews.title: Good to Start
customer_reviews.text: Only one gun works really well without clogging, but I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Airbrush kit
customer_reviews.text: Great price!!!! Work perfectly for all my painting needs. The guns have a heavy-duty feel to them. Very high quality product . I have already recommend this item to a lot of people.
customer_reviews.author: aaron holt

customer_reviews.title: Air tank is necessary
customer_reviews.text: Love the kit but if you hate noise I would advise getting an air tank as well, about every spray or two turns the compressor on so there’s constant vibrating even with headphones on it’s loud which ruins my concentration. Like I said great overall kit but just keep the amount of air it can hold on it’s own
customer_reviews.author: tadd

customer_reviews.title: When I pay for a new and working item I need it to be working not send me a used or spoiled items
customer_reviews.text: Gave me items that does not work while I paid for new items that’s unacceptable and unfair and is have been day’s without changing it or even doing anything to fix it
customer_reviews.author: Ifeanyi

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner kit for an introduction
customer_reviews.text: I think this was the best introduction kit for beginners. As you progress, you will no doubt purchase other product, but this is a quality kit fir the beginner
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Miller

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fast Shipping. Can't wait to start spraying my shoes with this
customer_reviews.author: rpg@yahoo

customer_reviews.title: I'm really happy with this airbrush kit
customer_reviews.text: I'm really happy with this airbrush kit. I have quite a few hobbies that I do and it comes in very handy, especially for painting foam popper bodies. No problems with it so far. Good price for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Snooker53

customer_reviews.title: Great for decorating cakes and cookies.
customer_reviews.text: This purchase was for cake/cookie decorating. The 2 stage airbrush (Only one we’ve used so far) works well, and is easy to control. There is a learning curve, but it’s easy to practice on paper towels. So far everything has worked how we expected it to.
customer_reviews.author: T F

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: So far so good . We’ll see how long it lasts Update:9/27/2019. It’s been almost two years. I’m still using this compressor. I broke the airbrush, my fault tho. I have no complain. Just one thing, remember to empty the water trap every now and then, or it’ll get messy.
customer_reviews.author: tyco

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: I admit that I am new to airbrushing, but I am impressed with the quality. After getting used to using it, I am happy with the way it works. The instructional video is quite helpful, especially if you are new to airbrushing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice little air compressor
customer_reviews.text: I just bought the compressor to save on canned air I use for certain art projects. It's not noisy, compact, and I am happy with it overall. Maybe one day I'll actually try airbrush painting...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for the price. Customer service is amazing if you have any issues. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Coleman

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Nice and quiet.
customer_reviews.text: Nice and quiet, but if you are using it for more than 5 minutes straight the compressor gets hot and produces alot of moisture. Need to and some paper towel in the water separator otherwise you'll end up with water going through your brush and line.
customer_reviews.author: ashley wegner

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.text: Im new to airbrushing. This is a decent setup for the price. Glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is working as it should and does a very good job. He is pretty happy
customer_reviews.text: This product was a gift. The delivery was very timely and my son's initial experience with the product has been very positive. It is working as it should and does a very good job. He is pretty happy, so I'm pretty happy. I would recommend the product and the company.
customer_reviews.author: Hugo R Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Great Entry Level Airbrush
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had a chance to use the product very much, yet, but it appears to be everything I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quick and secure.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had a chance to use all three brushes yet. Have used the smallest one. Works great. Air compressor is quite and provides all the air I need. Delivery was quick and on time. Everything was packaged securely. I would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with the purchase. As a beginner it's a good set to start with. Low cost so if you don't think the art is for you not alot lost.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy R

customer_reviews.title: A nice tool so far
customer_reviews.text: Very fast shipping, So far it Seems to be a very nice item for use in my small painting projects with my Hobbies
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for money.
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding value. Very easy to use, almost plug in and go. With 3 brushes, great variety of results are possible. Easy to clean, well built. It has elevated my modeling to a new level.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Drayton

customer_reviews.title: Good whole set for paint
customer_reviews.text: Nice for hoby. Moisture trap doesnt trap the water but most probably i had bad valve and company going to replace it, sending one new. they have good and caring customer service
customer_reviews.author: daniel

customer_reviews.title: This is a great set - very comprensive and the 3 brushes/compressor are ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set - very comprensive and the 3 brushes/compressor are a great value. The compressor is quiet and is adjustable. Love the set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: PointZero Airbrush Dual Action Airbrush Kit with 3 Airbrushes
product_meta.description: This multi-purpose airbrush kit is suitable for a variety of applications; models, crafts, auto & cycle graphics, taxidermy, photo retouching, t-shirts, murals, fine art & illustrations and more. Package includes a PointZero ultra compact air compressor, and 3 airbrush guns. One premium dual-action, internal-mix, gravity-feed with a 7cc color cup and a pre-installed 0.3mm nozzle set. One fine-detail dual-action, internal-mix, gravity-feed with a low-profile 2cc and a pre-installed 0.2mm nozzle set. One broad-coverage single-action, external-mix airbrush with a 22cc siphon feed jar and a 0.8mm nozzle set. Professional-grade airbrush compressor quietly delivers consistent air pressure for even results. Includes instructions, Airbrush Essentials: Master The Basics DVD, which will walk you through getting started or mastering basic skills and as an added bonus, included with this kit is a download link for these airbrushing guides: Top 8 Cake Airbrushing Tips, Guide to Airbrush Cake Decorating, Developing Basic Artistic Skills, 10 Essential Airbrushing Tips, Airbrushing Strokes and Techniques, Airbrushing Cleaning Manual and the Airbrush Lettering Guide.
feature_bullets: Includes 7 exclusive downloadable e-Book airbrushing guides.
Airbrush Essentials - Master the Basics DVD and access to exclusive airbrush knowledge base downloads
